author: Healdsburke
title: Ah Paris!!!
text:
Planned to stay at this hotel for our 50th wedding anniversary. Unfortunately an injury to my leg kept us in Lausanne and we were unable to go TWO days before our scheduled arrival at the hotel.
In fairness to the hotel (a Relais & Chateaux affiliate hotel) the Relais & Chateau cancellation policy is very clear "Reservations must be cancelled by 3pm - 3 days prior to arrival date to avoid a penalty of the full stay including tax" so I was 1 DAY late in my request to cancel. So I have no recourse.
I did contacted the hotel and asked if under the circumstances of the leg injury if they would consider charging me something less than the full stay. The email response after my personal call was as follows "cancellation conditions are INFLEXIBLE and $100% of your stay is due
